alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 3:02PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet and Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
